plentry.pd: 1: Uniformly scale the video until one of its dimensions fits the boundary (zoomed to fit). One dimension of the video may have clipped contents.
1: Uniformly scale the video until one of its dimension fits the boundary (zoomed to fit). Fit mode. Areas that are not filled due to disparity in the aspect ratio are filled with black.
4: The fill mode. In this mode, the SDK stretches or zooms the video to fill the display window.
